column4: hi everybody, I've question concerning Ubuntu of course - why is there ubuntu, kubuntu and xubuntu? can't I use KDE, Gnome and XFCE all in one distribution?
that means during logging in, cant I chose with which desktop I want to start? whether I want to use gnome or kde or xfce today?
just different CDs... to keep it to 1 disc... easy for people to install/use/understand who are new to linux.
